name: 文化觀光管理專題研究
goals: Possess integrated knowledge of cross-disciplinary analysis of cultural tourism management
Cultivation of innovative leadership and problem-solving ability in cultural tourism management
Possess the professional quality of cultural tourism practitioners
Possess the academic ability and critical thinking to study European cultural tourism
syllabus:
\[授課方式：16+2週，彈性授課方式= 專題講座\]

**Contents:**

1\. Introduction

2\. CT in Europe

3\. Planning of CT

4\. Product of CT

5\. Authenticity

6\. Marketing of CT

7\. Experiential CT  

8\. Creativity & CT

9\. CT & Regeneration

10\. Event Tourism

11.Heritage Tourism

12\. Conclusion

\* CT= cultural tourism
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
